Title: Addressing Modularity for Heterogeneous Multi-model Systems using Model Federation
CoreContribution: Introduces Model Federation as an alternative to model transformations for modularity across heterogeneous technical spaces
RelationToModelFederation: Canonical definition of Model Federation; federation is the primary architectural paradigm

Title: Continuous Requirements Engineering using Model Federation
CoreContribution: Applies Model Federation to continuous requirements evolution and cross-artifact consistency

Title: Model Federation and Probabilistic Analysis for Advanced OSS and BSS
CoreContribution: Combines model federation with probabilistic analysis across telecom systems

Title: Bridging the Gap Between Informal Requirements and Formal Specifications Using Model Federation
CoreContribution: Aligns informal and formal models without unification
RelationToModelFederation: Federation used as a semantic bridge across abstraction levels

Title: Towards Evolving Secured Multi-model Systems with Model Federation
CoreContribution: Extends federation to system evolution and security constraints
RelationToModelFederation: Modern extension of federation to evolution and security

Title: Conceptual Interoperability through Models Federation
CoreContribution: Defines conceptual space and technological connectors for federating heterogeneous models

Title: A Model-driven Approach for Ensuring Change Traceability and Multi-Model Consistency
CoreContribution: Uses correspondence metamodels to manage change across heterogeneous models

Title: Consistency Checking of Multi-Models Without Data Exchange
CoreContribution: Checks consistency across linked models without merging
RelationToModelFederation: Conceptually aligned with federation’s no-unification principle

Title: Coordinating Heterogeneous DSLs Using Megamodeling
RelationToModelFederation: Same coordination problem, different abstraction level

Title: A Megamodel-based Digital Twin Platform for Heterogeneous Systems
CoreContribution: Digital Twin platform coordinating heterogeneous models

Title: Understanding MDE Projects: Megamodels to the Rescue for Architecture Recovery

Title: Dynamic Hierarchical Megamodels for Traceability Management
CoreContribution: Dynamic linking and traceability across heterogeneous models

Title: Multi-model Consistency Preservation via Model Transformations
